content: pumpkin lane is a really fun and beautiful stranded colorwork cowl designed to teach you how to knit stranded colorwork with the provided free video tutorial the tutorial shows how to knit colorwork in 3 different styles 2 continental and 1 blend of continental and english knitting full video tutorial here 1 **sizing** 22 75 58 cm around by 9 5 24 cm tall **yarn** worsted / medium #4 * mc 120 yards 110 m * cc 105 yards 96 m *sample uses i stashbusted some leftover yarn of carlsbad worsted from explorer knits & fibers the mc is redwoods but i don t know the exact color name for the cc * **similar yarns** *i haven t tried these for this pattern but they have similar yardage to the sample yarn * * cascade 220 100% peruvian highland wool - 220 yds 200 m /100g * stitch please 100% wool - 220 yds 200 m / 100g madelinetosh tosh vintage 100% superwash merino wool - 200 yds 183 m /100g * kelbourne woolens lucky tweed 100% merino wool - 210 yds 192 m /100g * malabrigo rios solids 100% superwash merino wool - 210 yds 192 m /100g * plymouth yarns worsted 100% superwash fine merino wool - 218 yds 199 m /100g **needles** * gauge us 5 3 75 mm * recommended rib needles 1-2 sizes smaller than gauge **other materials** yarn needle and stitch markers **gauge** stockinette colorwork pattern in the round 22 5 sts / 28 row = 4 10 cm 1 https //youtu be/jizmw_gpcf0
